dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures, Shows railways, tramways, important buildings, and churches. North Italy Grid, Convergence. Grid North is 03°07ʹW of Ture North on this sheet. "2-43." "113600." "Grid provisional." Published by War Office 1942. United States. Army Map Service AMS 1. Reprinted 1943 by A.M.S. In upper left margin: "Italy." Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. G.S.G.S. no. 4380
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1942.
